title: Video: Takykardia – Immortalized
body:
This video from Danish trip-hop outfit **Takykardia** (derived from the Finnish word for “an abnormally rapid heart rate”) is absolutely mesmerising.

Inspired by nature documentaries, acid-jazz and hip hop beats, _Immortalized_ is a simply spellbinding debut. Check it out below.
